snippet: Boston survived a scoring drought that lasted almost half the third quarter, beating slumping Phoenix, 87-79, to get back above .500 for the first time in two weeks.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Boston Celtics beat Phoenix Suns, 87-79; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Boston survived a scoring drought that lasted almost half the third quarter, beating slumping Phoenix, 87-79, to get back above .500 for the first time in two weeks.

headline.seo: Celtics Rally in Win Over Suns and Surpass .500
headline.main: Celtics Break Out of Scoring Drought and Surpass .500
headline.print_headline: Celtics Break Out of Scoring Drought and Surpass .500
